      • getDepartmentById

        @GetMapping(value="/{id}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>> getDepartmentById(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                              java.lang.String id)
        Returns the information for a specific department.
        Parameters:
        id - This parameter contains the department identifier
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity> Returns the information in a map separating the department information and the managers information to avoid infinite JSON loops.
